rdf:Description.dc:title: Uniformly Random Generation of Floorplans
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Katsuhisa Yamanaka
Shin-ichiNakano
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: 一般社団法人情報処理学会
rdf:Description.prism:publicationName: 情報処理学会研究報告. AL, アルゴリズム研究会報告
rdf:Description.dc:description: In this paper we deal with problems on generating mosaic floorplans uniformly at random. We propose an algorithm that generates mosaic floorplans with f faces uniformly at random in polynomial time for each. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first such polynomial-time algorithm. By modifying the algorithm, we give two more algorithms to generate mosaic floorplans with some specified properties uniformly at random.

dcterms:isPartOf.dc:title: 情報処理学会研究報告. AL, アルゴリズム研究会報告

rdfs:seeAlso.dc:title: 情報処理学会で読む・さがす

rdf:Description.dc:description: In this paper we deal with problems on generating mosaic floorplans uniformly at random. We propose an algorithm that generates mosaic floorplans with f faces uniformly at random in polynomial time for each. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first such polynomial-time algorithm. By modifying the algorithm, we give two more algorithms to generate mosaic floorplans with some specified properties uniformly at random.
